1.question: Question: You have a 3-gallon jug and a 5-gallon jug. How can you measure out exactly 4 gallons of water?

answers.A: Fill the 5-gallon jug and pour it into the 3-gallon jug.
answers.B: Fill the 3-gallon jug and pour it into the 5-gallon jug.
answers.C: Fill the 5-gallon jug, pour it into the 3-gallon jug until full, leaving 2 gallons in the 5-gallon jug.
answers.D: Fill the 3-gallon jug, pour it into the 5-gallon jug until full, leaving 3 gallons in the 3-gallon jug.

12.question: Question: If a shirt costs $40 and is on sale for 20% off, how much will you pay?

13.question: Question: You are in a room with three light switches. Only one of them controls a light bulb in the next room. How do you find which switch controls the light if you can only make one trip into the next room?

answers.A: Flip each switch one by one and see which one controls the light.
answers.B: Leave one switch on for a few minutes, then flip another switch.
answers.C: Flip all switches on and off rapidly.
answers.D: Turn on one switch and wait for a while, then flip another switch.

15.question: Question: A farmer has 17 sheep, and all but 9 die. How many are left?

16.question: Question: I am taken from a mine and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?

17.question: Question: A plane crashes on the border between the U.S. And Mexico. Where do they bury the survivors?

answers.D: It depends on the survivors' preferences

18.question: Question: How many times can you subtract 7 from 49?

answers.C: As many times as you want

19.question: Question: How do you open the Task Manager in Windows?

answers.A: Ctrl + Alt + Del and select Task Manager
answers.C: Right-click on the desktop and select Task Manager
answers.D: Start Menu > Control Panel > Task Manager
